snippet.title: Atomic Ninjas on PS3 and PS Vita
snippet.description: This 2.5D competitive shooter/platformer is going to be one of the most insane experiences you'll ever have with your PS3 and PS Vita! You'll fight in arenas full of danger against crazed ninjas in intense and funny matches.  In order to win, you'll have to outsmart and outflank your opponents.
